description: This Python script initializes a PDF knowledge base with sample CV documents, sets up a vector database using LanceDB, and performs a filtered query through an Agent to retrieve specific user information.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: A class representing the LanceDB vector database used for storing and querying document embeddings.

classes.name: PDFKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class for managing a collection of PDF documents with associated metadata, supporting loading and filtering.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class that facilitates querying the knowledge base with filters and generating responses.

methods.name: download_knowledge_filters_sample_data
methods.description: Downloads sample PDF files for testing and returns their file paths.

methods.name: aload
methods.description: Loads documents into the knowledge base, optionally recreating the index.

methods.name: aprtint_response
methods.description: Generates a response based on a query, applying knowledge filters and formatting output.
